name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $url
desc: Returns: An absolute URI that is used to identify this activity definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this activity definition is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the activity definition. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this activity definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this activity definition is (or wil

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A formal identifier that is used to identify this activity definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $addidentifier
desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this activity definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this activity definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $::version
desc: Returns: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the activity definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the activity definition author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence. To provide a version consistent with the Decision Support Service specification, use the format Major.Minor.Revision (e.g. 1.0.0). For more information on versioning knowledge assets, refer to the Decision Support Service specification. Note that a version is required for non-experimental active assets.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the activity definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the activity definition author and is not expected to be globally un

name: $::name
desc: Returns: A natural language name identifying the activity definition. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the activity definition. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

name: $title
desc: Returns: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the activity definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the activity definition.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of this activity definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of this activity definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

name: $experimental
desc: Returns: A boolean value to indicate that this activity definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A boolean value to indicate that this activity definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date  (and optionally time) when the activity definition was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the activity definition changes.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the activity definition was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the acti

name: $publisher
desc: Returns: The name of the individual or organization that published the activity definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name of the individual or organization that published the activity definition.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free text natural language description of the activity definition from a consumer's perspective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the activity definition from a consumer's perspective.

name: $purpose
desc: Returns: Explaination of why this activity definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Explaination of why this activity definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

name: $usage
desc: Returns: A detailed description of how the asset is used from a clinical perspective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A detailed description of how the asset is used from a clinical perspective.

name: $approvalDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

name: $lastReviewDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval, but doesn't change the original approval date.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval, but doesn't change the original approval date.

name: $effectivePeriod
desc: Returns: The period during which the activity definition content was or is planned to be in active use.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The period during which the activity definition content was or is planned to be in active use.

name: $useContext
desc: Returns: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate activity definition instances.

name: $adduseContext
desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate activity definition instances.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate activity definition instances.

name: $jurisdiction
desc: Returns: A legal or geographic region in which the activity definition is intended to be used.

name: $addjurisdiction
desc: A legal or geographic region in which the activity definition is intended to be used.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the activity definition is intended to be used.

name: $topic
desc: Returns: Descriptive topics related to the content of the activity. Topics provide a high-level categorization of the activity that can be useful for filtering and searching.

name: $addtopic
desc: Descriptive topics related to the content of the activity. Topics provide a high-level categorization of the activity that can be useful for filtering and searching.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Descriptive topics related to the content of the activity. Topics provide a high-level categorization of the activity that can be useful for filtering and searching.

name: $contributor
desc: Returns: A contributor to the content of the asset, including authors, editors, reviewers, and endorsers.

name: $addcontributor
desc: A contributor to the content of the asset, including authors, editors, reviewers, and endorsers.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A contributor to the content of the asset, including authors, editors, reviewers, and endorsers.

name: $contact
desc: Returns: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $addcontact
desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $copyright
desc: Returns: A copyright statement relating to the activity definition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the activity definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the activity definition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the activity definition.

name: $relatedArtifact
desc: Returns: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

name: $addrelatedArtifact
desc: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

name: $library
desc: Returns: A reference to a Library resource containing any formal logic used by the asset.

name: $addlibrary
desc: A reference to a Library resource containing any formal logic used by the asset.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A reference to a Library resource containing any formal logic used by the asset.

name: $kind
desc: Returns: A description of the kind of resource the activity definition is representing. For example, a MedicationRequest, a ProcedureRequest, or a CommunicationRequest. Typically, but not always, this is a Request resource.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A description of the kind of resource the activity definition is representing. For example, a MedicationRequest, a ProcedureRequest, or a CommunicationRequest. Typically, but not always, this is a Request resource.

name: $code
desc: Returns: Detailed description of the type of activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Detailed description of the type of activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter.

name: $location
desc: Returns: Identifies the facility where the activity will occur; e.g. home, hospital, specific clinic, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the facility where the activity will occur; e.g. home, hospital, specific clinic, etc.

name: $participant
desc: Returns: Indicates who should participate in performing the action described.

name: $addparticipant
desc: Indicates who should participate in performing the action described.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates who should participate in performing the action described.

name: $quantity
desc: Returns: Identifies the quantity expected to be consumed at once (per dose, per meal, etc.).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the quantity expected to be consumed at once (per dose, per meal, etc.).

name: $dosage
desc: Returns: Provides detailed dosage instructions in the same way that they are described for MedicationRequest resources.

name: $adddosage
desc: Provides detailed dosage instructions in the same way that they are described for MedicationRequest resources.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Provides detailed dosage instructions in the same way that they are described for MedicationRequest resources.

name: $bodySite
desc: Returns: Indicates the sites on the subject's body where the procedure should be performed (I.e. the target sites).

name: $addbodySite
desc: Indicates the sites on the subject's body where the procedure should be performed (I.e. the target sites).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates the sites on the subject's body where the procedure should be performed (I.e. the target sites).

name: $transform
desc: Returns: A reference to a StructureMap resource that defines a transform that can be executed to produce the intent resource using the ActivityDefinition instance as the input.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A reference to a StructureMap resource that defines a transform that can be executed to produce the intent resource using the ActivityDefinition instance as the input.

name: $dynamicValue
desc: Returns: Dynamic values that will be evaluated to produce values for elements of the resulting resource. For example, if the dosage of a medication must be computed based on the patient's weight, a dynamic value would be used to specify an expression that calculated the weight, and the path on the intent resource that would contain the result.

name: $adddynamicValue
desc: Dynamic values that will be evaluated to produce values for elements of the resulting resource. For example, if the dosage of a medication must be computed based on the patient's weight, a dynamic value would be used to specify an expression that calculated the weight, and the path on the intent resource that would contain the result.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Dynamic values that will be evaluated to produce values for elements of the resulting resource. For example, if the dosage of a medication must be computed based on the patient's weight, a dynamic value would be used to specify an expression that calculat
